title: NYK, K Line, MISC and China LNG order more Qatar-bound gas ships
dc:creator: Sam Chambers
description: A quartet of Asian shipping powerhouses have won the next tranche of business in the huge QatarEnergy fleet expansion project. A consortium comprising Nippon Yusen Kaisha (NYK) and Kawasaki Kisen Kaisha (K Line) from Japan, Malaysiaâ€™s MISC and China LNG Shipping, the Cosco/China Merchants joint venture, have ordered five 174,000 cu m LNG carriers at …
